runs.notes: Easy Run 8km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Keep effort relaxed and controlled throughout.
Easy Run 7km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Recovery effort - should feel very comfortable after yesterday's longer run.
Easy Run 5km at 6:30-7:00/km pace. Keep effort relaxed and controlled throughout.
Long Run 18km at 6:15-6:45/km pace. Take water and consider energy gel at 12km. Start very easy first 2-3km then settle into pace.
